column1: '''Trilogy Tuesday''' was an event on December 16th
column2: 2003 in which theaters around the world showed all three of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] films by Sir [[Peter Jackson]] consecutively
column3: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|The Return of the King]]'' being played at midnight of the day it was released.
